Heading.name: Reactive
Heading.Info: Used to create interactive and dynamic web applications
Non blocking IO because nothing on the server is ever blocked
If the result depends on an extensive computation then only client will be blocked while waiting for the response
Server will return the promise of result Play will serve this result as soon as the promise is redeemed
